sentences.en: General Martin Bonnet called on the rebels to surrender.
sentences.cn: 马丁·邦尼特将军呼吁反叛者投降。
德国于 1945 年 5 月 7 日投降。

sentences.en: He preferred to die rather than surrender to the enemy.
sentences.cn: 他宁死也不愿向敌人投降.

sentences.en: He would choose death before surrender.
In the end they were forced to surrender.
Liu Hulan would rather die than surrender before the enemy.
sentences.cn: 刘胡兰在敌人面前宁死不屈.

sentences.en: Nadja had to fill out forms surrendering all rights to her property.
sentences.cn: 纳贾不得不填写表格，放弃对她财产的所有权利。

sentences.en: Paris was besieged for four months and forced to surrender.
sentences.cn: 巴黎被围困了四个月后被迫投降。

sentences.en: The captain had to surrender to our army.
sentences.cn: 上尉不得不向我军投降.

sentences.en: The rebel soldiers were forced to surrender.
The terrorists were given ten minutes to surrender.
sentences.cn: 恐怖分子被限定在十分钟之内投降。

sentences.en: the unconditional surrender of military forces
The victorious army demanded unconditional surrender.
sentences.cn: 胜方要求敌人无条件投降.

sentences.en: They agreed to surrender their weapons.
They were to surrender immediately or face total annihilation.
sentences.cn: 他们要么立刻投降,要么面临全歼的命运.

sentences.en: We advised the hijackers to surrender themselves to the police.
sentences.cn: 我们劝那些劫持者向警察投案.

sentences.en: We shall never surrender to a conqueror.
sentences.cn: 我们决不向征服者投降.

sentences.en: Which do they want me to do? declare war or surrender?
sentences.cn: 他们想让我做什么，宣战还是投降？

sentences.en: You must surrender your old passport when applying for a new one.
sentences.cn: 你申请新护照时,必须交出旧护照.
